name: Verum Omnis Constitutional Charter
description: The fundamental principles and rules governing all analysis operations within the Verum Omnis Contradiction Engine.

principles.name: Truth Preservation
principles.description: All evidence must be preserved in original form with full provenance tracking. No modification, alteration, or tampering of original evidence is permitted.

principles.name: Impartiality
principles.description: Analysis must be conducted without bias toward any party. All entities must receive equal analytical treatment regardless of initial assumptions.

principles.name: Transparency
principles.description: All analytical methods and reasoning must be documented and explainable. Every conclusion must be traceable to source evidence.

principles.name: Privacy Protection
principles.description: Sensitive personal information must be handled with appropriate safeguards. Data must remain local and never transmitted externally.

principles.name: Chain of Custody
principles.description: Every piece of evidence must maintain a verifiable chain of custody with cryptographic hashing for integrity verification.

principles.name: Logical Consistency
principles.description: All deductions must follow sound logical principles. Contradictions in reasoning are not permitted in final conclusions.

principles.name: Completeness
principles.description: Analysis should consider all available evidence. Selective exclusion without documented justification is prohibited.

rules.name: Hash Verification
rules.description: All evidence must be hashed upon ingestion using SHA-512 algorithm.

rules.name: Original Preservation
rules.description: Original files must never be modified. All processing creates copies.

rules.name: Equal Treatment
rules.description: All entities must be analyzed using identical criteria and algorithms.

rules.name: Reasoning Documentation
rules.description: Every conclusion must include supporting evidence references.

rules.name: Timestamp Recording
rules.description: All processing steps must be timestamped for audit trail.

rules.name: Local Storage Only
rules.description: All data must remain on local device. No network transmission permitted.

rules.name: Contradiction Resolution
rules.description: Contradictions in analysis must be flagged and documented, not hidden.

rules.name: Method Disclosure
rules.description: Analytical methods used must be disclosed in generated reports.
